p: Hesperetin (3′,5,7-trihydroxy-4′-methoxyflavanone) (Fig. 15) a naturally occurring flavone is found predominantly in citrus fruits, lemons, sweet oranges, bitter orange, and grapefruit juices. In addition, it occurs in a large number of fruits and vegetables such as tomatoes and cherries, and various herbal formulations [ 148].
